comment: Best Professor Ive taken so far. Hes hilarious. Cares about your ideas but will be quick to correct you with constructive criticism. Helped me grow as a student in many aspects.

He's an awesome studio professor! He really challenges you. He cares about his students and their progress in class and in life. You learn a lot from his structural engineering background. He's fun to be around and his class is always really easy going and lightweight even though the work is sometimes hard core. HIGHLY recommend him!
